item.description:
Lets check out a cool, free event that is coming to Boston. gdgt live is the only event series in the country designed specifically to give tech enthusiasts an opportunity to check out todayâ€™s hottest new products and services before buying them and provide feedback directly to the companies that make them.

Who: 25+ great brands from industry leaders to local startups showcasing their newest products and services.
RSVP: http://events.gdgt.com/gdgt-live-returns-to-boston/
The event is free, but you MUST sign up at the above website to get in.

The 1st several hundred attendees will have their choice between a gdgt T-shirt or gdgt-branded iPhone case when they enter and there will be lots of chances to win some terrific gear from our sponsors.

We also have drink tickets for the 21+ crowd
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) directly inside the event entrance. Please call/text Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: gdgt Live Tech Event- Check out new products at this fun event, free drinks too
